content.description:
Sit start at the obvious jug rail, and climb directly.

While the necessary holds are solid, this lowball boulder is covered in rotten rock and choss. Thereâ€™s a cool move, but the chossy and lowball nature of this line might merit skipping this one.
content.location: Several hundred feet west of the Spire and <100 feet downhill from the rest of The Keep. If navigating from the Spire, walk west on Ponderosa Trail until reaching a wooden bench. The Keep is directly uphill of the bench.

content.description:
Choose your own adventure! The massive slab side of the Keep Boulder has a handful of highball lines with solid rock ranging from about 5.5 to V2. In general, the further right that you trend, the harder the climbing becomes.

All variations are similar enough to merit listing them under a single name rather than naming them separately.
content.location:
This ascends the massive slab face of The Keep. It is directly above

Nerd Burglar

, which is directly above Ponderosa Trail.

content.description:
Begin as for

Before Us

, but immediately bust out right, utilizing a variety of crimps and sidepulls to climb up and right.
Located on the left side of the face, Before Us starts matched on a flat one pad edge and trends directly up using big moves and big holds.
content.location: It is on the left side of the face.

content.description:
Begin matched on a heinous crimp several feet below and right of the stand's start hold. Bust a difficult move into either the

right

or left variation, and finish as per either stand.
